segments.text: Hello there . I need to buy some foreign currency for a business trip . How much can I exchange ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That does depend on where you plan to travel . If you are planning to travel to Hong Kong or Macao we can exchange up to 1,000 USD for you . If your destination is elsewhere , we can exchange up to 2,000 USD .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , well , I'm going to Europe . I guess 1,000 USD will be sufficient for now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I'll process that for you now .
segments.speaker: S1
